name: Httpsnowhere
tagline: Protect yourself from the illusion of security. Replaces all HTTPS requests with HTTP ones.
body:
# HTTPSNoWhere
============

Protect yourself from the illusion of security. Replaces all HTTPS requests with HTTP ones.

## FAQ
1. Won't this break websites without https?
Yes. This is by design. How can you be truly sure you're compromised unless all the pages you visit are http only?
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
